metadata.title: CVE-2024-45193 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Matrix libolm through 3.2.16. There is Ed25519signature malleability due to lack of validation criteria (does not ensurethat S < n). This refers to the libolm implementation of Olm. NOTE: Thisvulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by themaintainer.

criterions.comment: olm package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
